alert.note: Alert for Newton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 25 at 9:49PM EST until February 26 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Iroquois River near Foresman affecting Newton County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/Chicago and water.weather.gov The next statement is expected by tomorrow afternoon. && ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain, snowmelt, and river ice continues. * WHERE...Iroquois River near Foresman. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, low lying agricultural areas near the river begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CST Friday, the stage was 15.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below Action Stage tomorrow afternoon. - Action stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
